column2: Computer Science has 6 tracks: Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Cyber Security, Data Science and Engineering, Software Engineering, Graphics and Game programming

The fees for Computer Science students are 172,400 before the discount. After the discount the fees are 103,440. There are additional dicounts and scholarships, visit the following link to know more -> https://eui.edu.eg/en/admission/tuition-fees/
